name: Jack-of-All-Trades
text: You are a jack-of-all-trades; learning new skills comes naturally to you, and you enjoy pitting your abilities against any challenge. Your thirst for knowledge will drive you to learn new skills until the day you die.

features.dabbler(11thLevel): You gain a +2 bonus to all skill checks
features.expertAssault(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you gain a +5 bonus to skill checks until the end of your turn
features.advancedDabbler(16thLevel): You gain training in three skills

flavorText: Yeah . . . I can do that, and that . . . and that.
